description:
Braviary, known as the Valor Pokémon, is an eagle-like Pokémon, sporting red, blue, and yellow coloration. The top part of his body and wings are red, while the underside is blue. Braviary`s tail is red, with yellow and blue stripes at the end. His talons and beak are yellow, and his feathery mane is white. Braviary is a male-only species, with his female counterpart being the vulture-like Pokémon, Mandibuzz. Braviary will fight for his comrades without a second thought for danger. He can dance through the skies while grasping an automobile. A soldier of the skies with dauntless courage, it will get more respect from its comrades the more wounds it has. Braviary are exclusively male.
In the video games, Braviary can only be found in the Pokémon White. In the Pokémon Adventures manga, Black owns a Braviary named War. War is strong and can lift Black into the sky with ease, making him useful for flying purposes.
Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava praised Braviary`s name, stating "Finally, a pun that doesn`t suck!", and said "Everything about this 90 pound, ass-kicking bird makes me happy." In a poll by Official Nintendo Magazine, Braviary was voted as one of the best Pokémon from Black and White. Editor Thomas East stated that "Braviary is one of the best looking birds of any Generation".
name: Warrgle
